Text:
Thanks a million for this uload.
This show has been fairly described by it's director as "The Sopranos in thongs"
Is there any chance of getting the following episodes? :-) 
P.S. "Thongs" are what Aussies wear on their feet and are aka flip-flops, hawaii chappal, Japanese sandals, or jandals. 
They are not "freckle floss" ;-)
